title: Arched logo text
author: max_darling

comments.content:
Appears to be Myriad Bold (ignore the automatic |fi| ligature that Myfonts threw in):  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/myriad/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317143741/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/myriad/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/myriad/")
